About the Channel

Dustin Abbott is one of the most respected photography reviewers on YouTube. While he covers multiple systems, his M43 reviews are thorough, technical, and incredibly helpful for making purchasing decisions.

Content Style

  • In-depth technical reviews with optical bench testing
  • Real-world shooting in various conditions
  • Detailed comparisons between similar lenses
  • Honest pros and cons for every product

Why We Recommend This Channel

Dustin‚Äôs reviews go beyond surface-level impressions. He provides actual measurements, sample images at various settings, and thoughtful analysis of who each lens is best suited for. His production quality is excellent and his presentation style is clear and engaging.

Best For

  • People researching specific lens purchases
  • Those who want technical data and measurements
  • Understanding optical performance and characteristics
  • Learning about lens comparison and selection

Recent M43 Content

Check his channel for recent reviews of:

  • Olympus PRO series lenses
  • Panasonic Leica collaborations
  • Third-party M43 options (Sigma, Tamron, etc.)
